extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 2/4/2017. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: NovaGamesLib-Bukkit

      • init

        public void init()
        Connects to the database and loads everything needed.

        **DO NOT USE** NovaGamesLib will handle this part internally!!!

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Disconnects from the database.

        **DO NOT USE** NovaGamesLib will handle this part internally!!!

      • addPlayerStats

        public java.lang.Boolean addPlayerStats(PlayerStats stats)
        Adds or updates a player's stats in the database for a specific game.
        Parameters:
        stats - The stats to insert into the database.
        Returns:
        true if successful, otherwise false.

      • getPlayerStats

        public PlayerStats getPlayerStats(java.util.UUID uuid,
                         java.lang.String gameName)
        Gets the PlayerStats of the specified player for the corresponding game.

        Fails silently:
        This will return blank (everything = 0) stats should it fail.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player whose stats you wish to get.
        gameName - The name of the game that the stats are from.
        Returns:
        A PlayerStats object with the player's stats.
